text: E pura me bagh osir kamagh me mɨkɨm suam, ia me marvir guabagh anɨdir daghebar amɨ, egh ia Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzegham. Ia dagher kabar aman markɨ. Ia uari isava akuir arazir kurabar amuan markɨ. Egha asɨzir me benibar fɨribav kɨrima ariaghɨriba, dar ghuziba darara iti. Ia dar aman markɨ. Egh ia ghuzitam raman markɨ.
